Summary: saw strange "plane"above house,went to park,saw odd lights,heard a voice and lost a day and half.
divs: sighting detailshi,in spring\summer of '07 late at night i went into my garden,right above my house was huge cross shaped"plane"with red\white ights on wing tips,but it just hung in sky.then i heard voice in my head telling me to go to park up rd.i was shaking so much i could hardly walk,and scared so i took dog with me.walking up alleyway by park i saw row of white lights about waist hieght,then i turned arond and behind me were several white lights in a group,got really scared.suddenly a thought came into my head"oh,it's only humans"and the fear melted away.(i didn't see anyone though)and that's all i remember,i woke up on sun afternoon,fully clothed in bed.it had happened on a fri night. we've had loads and still have poltergiest activity,plus many other strange events with other people involved. i have lots odd photographs,but i dont know how to put them up,if you want to see them i can show you my facebook page,but want to keep most of them private,thankyou.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Portsmouth
There were no other sightings in Portsmouth on or around April 30th 2007
